page.content: {SOCIAL CONCERNS} Oil,gas and coal are used to provide energy.We only have a certain amount of these fuels.When we use them up they cannot be replaced.The demand for energy is growing continually.This is how we use energy in our home today. We have a gas fire in the living room and oil-fired central heating which gives us hot water to bath and shower. We have an electric washing machine and tumble drier.We have an electric fidge and freezer.We have two cars,one runs on petrol which costs Â£2 a gallon and one on deisel which costs Â£2-50. They each use about eight gallons a week.We also have a T.V. and video,a hi-fi system and a computer.
